alert.note: Alert for Bleckley; Dodge; Laurens; Pulaski; Twiggs; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 8:42AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Laurens, southwestern Wilkinson, northwestern Dodge, central Pulaski, southeastern Twiggs and Bleckley Counties through 915 AM EDT... At 842 AM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms extended from near Marion to Porter to near Finleyson, and moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Cochran, Eastman, Hawkinsville, Jeffersonville, Irwinton, Chester, Dudley, Danville, Montrose, Allentown, Marion, Dubois, Tarversville, Empire, Mobley Crossing, Roddy, Nicklesville, Baileys Park, Rowland and Ocmulgee Banks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Bleckley; Dodge; Laurens; Pulaski; Twiggs; Wilkinson
